subject: Soccer
Bribery and Kickbacks
organizations: Confederation of North, Central American and Caribbean Association Football (CONCACAF)
lead_paragraph: Questions remain after the arrests of several high-ranking members of soccer’s governing body. Here’s what you need to know about where the case stands.
snippet: Questions remain after the arrests of several high-ranking members of soccer’s governing body. Here’s what you need to know about where the case stands.
